# textDidBeginEditing(_:)

**Instance Method**

Posts a notification to the default notification center that the text is about to go into edit mode.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func textDidBeginEditing(_ notification: Notification)
```

## Parameters

- **notification**: The [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl/textDidBeginEditingNotification] notification to post to the default notification center.

## Discussion

This action causes the text field’s delegate to receive a [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/objectivec/nsobject/1428934-controltextdidbeginediting] message. See [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSControl] for more information about the text delegate method.

## Implementing Delegate Methods

- **textShouldBeginEditing(_:)**: Requests permission to begin editing a text object.
- **textDidChange(_:)**: Posts a notification when the text changes, and forwards the message to the text field’s cell if it responds.
- **textShouldEndEditing(_:)**: Performs validation on the text field’s new value.
- **textDidEndEditing(_:)**: Posts a notification when the text is no longer in edit mode.
